import React,{useState} from 'react' import Input from '../../components/Input/Input' import './auth.scss' import Button from '../../components/Button/Button' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' const Register = () => { const [register,setRegister]= useState({ username:'', email:'', password:'', age:'', fullname:'', img:'' }) const handleInput =(event, id)=>{ let copyRegister = {...register} copyRegister[id] =event.target.value; setRegister({...copyRegister}) } const handleRegister =()=>{ console.log(register) } return (
